name: Doggy Dog World Academic Simulator II (more dogs)
name_original: Doggy Dog World Academic Simulator II (more dogs)
description:
Pursuit of knowledge and enlightenment...but for DOGS. Education...for Dogs. SCHOOL..for dogs, BY dogs. Dogs that CAN READ. Dogs that CAN WRITE. A future for dogs that is bright and full of Smartness.

Founded nearly 70 dog years ago by our Principal Digby in the lot behind 7’11, Canine Institute is dedicated to realizing a future where classrooms are accessible to dogs across the universe (Midwest would be ok too).
